# IP Subnet Calculator - Next.js Project

This is a Next.js-based IP subnet calculator that helps users calculate network information from IP addresses and CIDR notation.

## Project Features

- IP address and CIDR prefix input validation
- Network address calculation
- Broadcast address calculation
- First and last usable host addresses
- Total hosts per subnet calculation
- Number of subnets calculation
- Subnet mask in decimal and binary formats
- Wildcard mask calculation for ACLs

## Technology Stack

- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- React components for interactive calculator
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Input validation and error handling

## Development Guidelines

- Use functional components with React hooks
- Implement proper TypeScript interfaces
- Include comprehensive input validation
- Provide clear error messages for invalid inputs
- Make the interface responsive and user-friendly
